title: Pixel3 XL Android 11 update buggy.
content:
After update very buggy.
Incoming calls go straight to speakerphone
Random phone freezes, restarts when exiting chrome tabs. 
No screenshot except pwr\vol down. {Yes I know it moved to so drawer but not there}
Just a host of small user interface problems that annoy. Would roll back to 10 in I knew how.
